Side note:
If superhero superpowers were real I would wish for the ability to screw with probability for the sole reason of to metaphorically fuck with people.

"Tonight on foxnews; our new study shows that pornograpy causes infidelity"
*next day
"Correction apparently watching porn cures infidelity"
"Tonight on TMZ why leonardo dicaprio won't win any oscars"
*next day
"Tonight on TMZ why leonardo dicaprio won every last oscar, even 'best female actor' oscar"
"Tonight on IGN, why COD has broken every sales record"
*next day
"Why this game that didn't pay us any advertising dollars just broke every sales record for video gaming and made COD it's bitch monetarily"

I wouldn't be evil or anything; just constantly prank yellow journalist twats.

topics.body:
"@SquiggyBomb":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/53509c866368721278bd0000#post_53509c866368721278bd0000
A more realistic scenario of such a thing if mutants and sentinels were real is that the political shitstorm would be so great that after months of every 24/7 news company constantly showing crushed human bodies that were stepped on my sentinels the president and all people involved would be convicted of crimes against humanity and high treason then summarily executed.  After this the new congress and new president would be so for mutant rights, humans after witnessing thousands of americans crushed to death by sentinels would be extremely accepting of mutants under the reason of "hey your powers may be dangerous, but our last president went around murdering thousands of innocent civilians and causing hundreds of millions of dollars of damage each time sentinels were deployed in a modern day witch hunt so we totally accept you".

It'd be like witnessing dozens of 9/11 and then being told the countless civilian deaths were ordered by the government for "your protection".

Hey better yet why not drop a hydrogen bomb on miami and then go "lol for your protection"?  That would have caused less deaths and less property damage if you add up all the deaths and damage done by sentinels.
